name: hXtrat
description:
I welcome you to enjoy this old retro strategy board game that I made a few years ago.

Get ready to set the best laid plans of your enemies awry, in this completely original strategy game! Place growing arrows on the board to claim the most area! Sound simple? A looping grid with redirecting spaces keep things interesting and challenging.

Comes with a one player mode, local two player mode, and a custom level creator where you can build your own map!
